segments.text: Everything seems to be getting worse . I don't know what to do with it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Things are tough all over . You should never give up !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But how can I prevent a deficit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you should make a thorough market investigation now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , OK . I â€™ ll do my best .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I always consider you are such a guy who never gives up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know life is not all roses , and I believe I will pull this through .
segments.speaker: S2
